code: import{api}from'./api';const getDashboard=async()=>{const response=await api.get('/admin/dashboard');return response.data;};const getOverview=async()=>{const response=await api.get('/admin/overview');return response.data;};const getBooksStatistics=async()=>{const response=await api.get('/admin/books/statistics');return response.data;};const getBestSellers=async function(){let limit=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:10;const response=await api.get('/admin/bestsellers',{params:{limit}});return response.data;};const getLargestOrders=async()=>{const response=await api.get('/admin/largest-orders');return response.data;};export const adminAPI={getDashboard,getOverview,getBooksStatistics,getBestSellers,getLargestOrders};
